      This is a version of reservations in which vehicles with a green light get priority.

      This class implements traffic signals at intersections (Node) of a network.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the Signalized form of the IntersectionControl, if it exists

      Returns a Signalized for this intersection, if one exists, to add signal data

      Returns the Signalized version of this intersection.

      Returns the Signalized associated with this Node, if one exists.
